pullRequest.title: More compact convergence output
pullRequest.bodyText: @hakonhall please review. There is more to come: convergence summary for install steps, and the actual adaptive timeout.

commit.message: Wipe certificates when writing runs to history
Store instant since which no nodes were allowed to be down in run
Store summary of convergence of application deployment in run
Print convergence summary for unfinished, but started, convergence steps

nodes.bodyText: "Number of suspended nodes with pending platform upgrade"? E.g. we actually don't know whether a node is suspended because it plans to upgrade.
(I liked this message in the original, as it made it crystal clear I need to wait longer. But it could be this is superfluous with the other changes...)
